MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync (System.IO.Stream source, System.IO.Stream destination, Nullable<long> count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancel);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync(class System.IO.Stream source, class System.IO.Stream destination, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int64> count, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancel) cil managed

Docs.param: The stream from which the contents will be copied.
The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The count of bytes to be copied.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the source stream and writes them to another stream.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync (System.IO.Stream source, System.IO.Stream destination, Nullable<long> count, int bufferSize, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancel);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync(class System.IO.Stream source, class System.IO.Stream destination, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int64> count, int32 bufferSize, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancel) cil managed

Docs.param: The stream from which the contents will be copied.
The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The count of bytes to be copied.
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. The default size is 4096.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the source stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
